Example: These are the Medications for ${Patient.firstname} ${Patient.lastName} for ${MedicationStatement.medicationCodeableConcept.coding[0].display}. Please review the data for more detail.

IF (Encounter is still open - no discharge_date) 
then Literal 'active' 
else Literal `unknown`

IF (EncounterMedication exists for this patient)
then Literal `http://nzmt.org.nz`
else Literal `http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips`

IF (EncounterMedication exists for this patient)
then EncounterMedication.medication_id => ReferenceData.id.code
else Literal `no-medication-info`

IF (EncounterMedication exists for this patient)
then EncounterMedication.medication_id => ReferenceData.id.name
else Literal `No information about medications`
